name: Neko Cup
description:
This game name's Neko Cup : Endless Run 2D For Challenge User game scoring and relaxation Compete to show off their scores . Neko Cup Game have adventures in the ocean and escape from the dangerous shark. Collect fish for score and this is favorite food cat Meaw >w< . Let's go for your life and food If the cat is eaten the game is over.

Gameplay : Push button left and right for move

Collect : Fish and salmon but bomb is danger
